oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Southern Review, April 1898
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Southern Review, An Illustrated Monthly Magazine. April 1898. Vol. [3], No. 1. Published in Knoxville, TN. Price 10 cents. Front cover, with illustration of Joshua W. Caldwell.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Periodicals;
